song.title: Sunset of Tomorrow
song.info:
explizit is proud to present:
sunset of tomorrow
written by KoM'AH
finished on 17-08-96
- PLAY IN FT2.06 !!! - songlength: 9:05 size: 577 kb style: drum 'n bass
well here's the song i told you about in my previous production. it's a long track,yes, again, but that's a normal phenomenon in the drum 'n bass scene... so all you 3minute-shortsong- raveonly-lowlife shut up, or delete this xm right away, you can't make me move. ha! greetinx to all scene geezers around the world worth greeting, and to all my personal friends..... who will probably only get to hear this on tape, 'cos they don't have the proper stuph for these musicphilez ;)
of course special greetz 'n respect to all drum 'n bass fans around the globe.. ( i guess most of 'em are english ;) ) and i hope one of the following guys gets to hear this:
LTJ Bukem / PFM Peshay / Goldie Future Bound / Skanna Aphrodite / Photek M-Beat / Alex Reece, keep up the very very good work! you're music elevates our minds 'n stuph... at least it's very relaxing music you bring forth....
but 'nuff said... i'm wasting time typing crap here and i don't WANT to fill up this space like some of you porkfaces do...so i say.. bye!
